title: Drawing, "Two Designs for Portico and Court of Palace", early 19th century
medium: Pen and ink, brush and brown wash, over traces of black chalk on heavy white paper

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Two Designs for Portico and Court of Palace", early 19th century.
early 19th century. Pen and ink, brush and brown wash, over traces of black chalk on heavy white paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-337.
